commands.default: Tracks your billable hours. Input 'hourly' when you begin any billable work and type 'hourly' to stop the timer.
commands.start: example: "hourly start 09:30" sets your current clock-in to 09:30 //TODO
commands.stop: example "hourly stop 10:30" sets your current clock-out to 10:30 //TODO
commands.report: Outputs hours worked since the last pay period.
commands.end: Outputs hours worked since the last pay period and clears the current pay period.

text.timer_running: You have a current time running. Please end the timer to calculate hours.
text.no_timer_running: You do not have a current timer running.
